mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PY_PWSL_MSG_RESPONSE( UUID, CRT_TIME, CRT_USER, TRN_ID, MESSAGE_BODY, APP_ID ) VALUES( sys_guid(), sysdate, #{crtUser,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{trnId,jdbcType = CHAR}, #{msaagesBody}, #{appId}
)
mapper.select: SELECT P.MESSAGE_BODY FROM PY_PWSL_MSG_RESPONSE P LEFT JOIN PY_PWSL_TRN_REQUEST R ON P.TRN_ID=R.TRN_ID WHERE R.NAME=#{name} AND R.CERT_NO=#{certNo} AND R.QUERY_MODE='1' AND P.CRT_TIME < SYSDATE AND P.CRT_TIME > SYSDATE-1 ORDER BY P.CRT_TIME
